transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: Hello, how can I help you?

transcript.speaker: Caller
transcript.text: I would really like to understand what is going on with you guys. My internet hasn't worked for one week!

transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry to hear that, can you please state your customer id?

transcript.speaker: Agent
transcript.text: Ok, thank you, let me look you up.
